metadata.title: CVE-2016-7075 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: It was found that Kubernetes as used by Openshift Enterprise 3 did not correctly validate X.509 client intermediate certificate host name fields. An attacker could use this flaw to bypass authentication requirements by using a specially crafted X.509 certificate.

notes.note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
